description.value:
The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d6 type=fire average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save wis 19 format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The dracolich exhales &Reference[fire]{fire} in a 60-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save dex 21 format=long]], taking [[/damage 18d6 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Lair Actions

On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dracolich takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dracolich can’t use the same effect two rounds in a row:

  • Magma erupts from a point on the ground the dracolich can see within 120 feet of it, creating a 20-foot-high, 5-foot-radius geyser. Each creature in the geyser’s area must make a [[/save dex 15 format=long]], taking [[/damage 6d6 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
  • A tremor shakes the lair in a 60-foot radius around the dracolich. Each creature other than the dracolich on the ground in that area must succeed on a [[/save dex 15 format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.
  • Volcanic gases form a cloud in a 20-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} centered on a point the dracolich can see within 120 feet of it. The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round. Each creature that starts its turn in the cloud must succeed on a [[/save con 13 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} until the end of its turn. While &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} in this way, a creature is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}.
The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

A Red Dracolich's Lair

Red dracoliches lair in high mountains or hills, dwelling in caverns under snow-capped peaks, or within the deep halls of abandoned mines and dwarven strongholds. Caves with volcanic or geothermal activity are the most highly prized red dracolich lairs, creating hazards that hinder intruders and letting searing heat and volcanic gases wash over a dracolich as it sleeps.

With its hoard well protected deep within the lair, a red dracolich spends as much of its time outside the mountain as in it. For a red dracolich, the great heights of the world are the throne from which it can look out to survey all it controls—and the wider world it seeks to control.

Throughout the lair complex, servants erect monuments to the dracolich's power, telling the grim story of its life, the enemies it has slain, and the nations it has conquered.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Regional Effects

The region containing a legendary red dracolich's lair is warped by the dracolich's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

  • Small earthquakes are common within 6 miles of the dracolich's lair.
  • Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally warm and tainted by sulfur.
  • Rocky fissures within 1 mile of the dracolich's lair form portals to the &Reference[elemental]{Elemental} Plane of &Reference[fire]{Fire}, allowing creatures of &Reference[elemental]{elemental} &Reference[fire]{fire} into the world to dwell nearby.

If the dracolich dies, these effects fade over the course of 1d10 days.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The dracolich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dracolich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Detect. The dracolich makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

Tail Attack. The dracolich makes a tail attack.

Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions). The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a [[/save dex 22 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 8 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The dracolich can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The dracolich makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a [[/save dex 22 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 8 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The dracolich can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day). If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
